5fc2e0fd-1a5f-4630-b8c8-49ed4a9ac19c.description: The test names and descriptions should be part of the application content, linked to the requirements and userstories.
5fc2e0fd-1a5f-4630-b8c8-49ed4a9ac19c.solution_proposal: Do not describe tests at all - tests are code and they should remain code , but do describe features and functionalities with guids.
